title: Full Body Checkup
text: A comprehensive checkup to monitor overall health and detect early signs of diseases.

title: Blood Test
text: Includes a range of tests to assess your health markers and identify potential issues.

title: ECG Monitoring
text: A test to monitor your heart's electrical activity and identify any irregularities.

title: X-Ray Imaging
text: Advanced X-ray technology to capture detailed images of bones and internal organs.

title: Ultrasound Scan
text: Non-invasive scan to visualize internal organs and monitor fetal development during pregnancy.
